narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sunny Haven Residental Services is a Intermediate Care Facility, Intellectual Disabilities provider based in Staunton, VA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.4M in Medicaid payments across 7K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
